main.name: Full-Stack Developer
main.description: Hello, I'm Ibangha Ike, a Full Stack Alchemist: Building Tomorrow's Digital Landscape with Precision and Innovation
main.bio: Hello! I'm Ibangha Ike, a dedicated and creative Full Stack Developer on a mission to bring ideas to life through elegant and efficient code. With a foundation in React, TailwindCSS, PHP/Laravel, NodeJS/Express, and a flair for design, I thrive in turning concepts into seamless digital experiences. Let's build something extraordinary together!
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here are some of the skills I have aquired throughout my development career.

education.description: Throughout my academic journey in Computer Engineering at the University of Uyo, I've gained a comprehensive understanding of both hardware and software aspects of computing. I've delved into subjects like digital logic design, computer architecture, algorithms, data structures, and operating systems, equipping me with the knowledge to analyze and design complex systems.

work.title: Snr Backend Developer
work.description: As a Backend Developer at GuardUp, a leading Nigerian security company, I developed and maintained secure, scalable web applications using Laravel. I collaborated with teams to deliver user-friendly solutions, managed databases, integrated APIs, and optimized performance. My work enhanced GuardUpâ€™s digital infrastructure, supporting its mission to provide innovative security services.

work.title: Full-Stack Developer
work.description: At PFM.Company, I seamlessly integrated Bootstrap with Laravel to develop visually appealing and responsive web applications. Leveraging Bootstrap's extensive front-end components, I crafted intuitive user interfaces that provided an exceptional user experience across various devices. Working within the Laravel framework, I implemented robust backend functionalities, ensuring the seamless flow of data and interactions. My responsibilities included designing and developing features, handling data validation, and optimizing performance for optimal user engagement.

work.title: Front-End Developer
work.description: At Sofrosyn, I developed reliable and responsive company dashboard application using React, from design to implementation.

work.title: Front-End Developer
work.description: At Praxeum AI, I played a key role in developing responsive, scalable, and performance-optimized client-side applications. My focus was on meeting the organization's business needs through effective application design and implementation.
